kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=api, url=http://localhost:3000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.msg: ${header} = {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: ${response} = <Response [201]>
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.msg: ${USER_ID} = G7OxEeuoJPiZXDF1
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://localhost:3000/usuarios/G7OxEeuoJPiZXDF1 path_url=/usuarios/G7OxEeuoJPiZXDF1 headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
${response} = <Response [200]>
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.msg: ${retorno_get} = {'nome': 'Cristiano Ferreira', 'email': 'cristiano@email.com', 'password': 'Abc123', 'administrador': 'true', '_id': 'G7OxEeuoJPiZXDF1'}
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
